Orgun wrote:

[quote:1fyzutox]Hey Alan, how's the lib coming along?[/quote:1fyzutox]

Well, its coming along steadily. I had to add and rework quite a lot of code to make some of the new stuff possible so there are of course a whole raft of bugs and similar wobblies to sort out.

I'm fixing the faults as fast as my testers find them, and the bug discovery rate has now slowed down to a trickle, so the libraries (Typelib is now a 'two-parter' so that you don't have to bloat games by including code they will never need) should be ready for a more public 'testing' soon.

Once the feature set is finally fixed, I can add the QDK interface and write a manual/demo piece, at present that would be premature.   

Thanks for your interest!

Al (MaDbRiT)
